  "evidence": [
    "In electron capture, a proton in the nucleus is transformed into a neutron.",
    "By capturing this electron, the proton combines with it to form a neutron, and a neutrino is released.",
    "To release that excess energy, it emits X-rays or Auger electrons.",
    "additional radiation is produced through what we call bremsstrahlung",
    "The daughter nucleus is often left in an excited state.",
